TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SyndicationFeed extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示顶级源的对象中，在 Atom 1.0 为 <>，在 RSS 2.0 中为 <>。

span.span: Represents a top-level feed object, <> in Atom 1.0 and <> in RSS 2.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化为 Atom 1.0 时实例写入到 <`feed`> 元素。When serialized to Atom 1.0, a instance is written to a <`feed`> element. 下表显示如何将 类中定义的每个属性序列化为 Atom 1.0。The following table shows how each property defined in the class is serialized to Atom 1.0. |SyndicationFeed 属性SyndicationFeed property|序列化形式Serialized form| |------------------------------|---------------------| |`AttributeExtensions`|中的属性 <`feed`> 为集合中每个属性的元素。An attribute in the <`feed`> element for each attribute in the collection.| |`Authors`|<`author`> 元素为每个集合中。An <`author`> element for each in the collection.| |`Categories`|一个 <`category`> 元素为每个集合中。A <`category`> element for each in the collection.| |`Contributors`|一个 <`contributor`> 元素为每个集合中。A <`contributor`> element for each in the collection.| |`Copyright`|一个 <`rights`> 元素。A <`rights`> element.| |`Description`|一个 <`subtitle`> 元素。A <`subtitle`> element.| |`ElementExtensions`|集合中的每个元素写入 <`feed`> 元素。Each element in the collection is written within the <`feed`> element.| |`Generator`|一个 <`generator`> 元素。A <`generator`> element.| |`Id`|<`id`> 元素。An <`id`>element.| |`ImageUri`|一个 <`logo`> 元素。A <`logo`> element.| |`Items`|<`entry`> 元素为每个集合中。An <`entry`> element for each in the collection.| |`Language`|未序列化。Not serialized.| |`LastUpdatedTime`|<`updated`> 元素。An <`updated`> element.| |`Links`|一个 <`link`> 元素为每个集合中。A <`link`> element for each in the collection.| |`Title`|一个 <`title`> 元素。A <`title`> element.| 序列化为 RSS 2.0 时实例写入到 <`rss`> 元素。When serialized to RSS 2.0, a instance is written to an <`rss`> element. 下表显示如何将 类中定义的每个属性序列化为 RSS 2.0。The following table shows how each property defined in the class is serialized to RSS 2.0. |SyndicationFeed 属性SyndicationFeed property|序列化形式Serialized form| |------------------------------|---------------------| |`AttributeExtensions`|中的属性 <`channel`> 为集合中每个属性的元素。An attribute in the <`channel`> element for each attribute in the collection.| |`Authors`|一个 <`managingEditor`> 元素，如果只有一个位于集合; 否则为 <`a10:author`> 元素为每个集合中。A <`managingEditor`> element if only one is in the collection; otherwise, an <`a10:author`> element for each in the collection.| |`Categories`|一个 <`category`> 元素为每个集合中。A <`category`> element for each in the collection.| |`Contributors`|<`a10:contributor`> 元素为每个集合中。An <`a10:contributor`> element for each in the collection.| |`Copyright`|一个 <`copyright`> 元素。A <`copyright`> element.| |`Description`|一个 <`description`> 元素。A <`description`> element.| |`ElementExtensions`|集合中的每个元素写入 <`channel`> 元素。Each element in the collection is written within the <`channel`> element.| |`Generator`|一个 <`generator`> 元素。A <`generator`> element.| |`Id`|<`a10:id`> 元素。An <`a10:id`> element.| |`ImageUri`|<`image`> 元素。An <`image`> element.| |`Items`|<`item`> 元素为每个集合中。An <`item`> element for each in the collection.| |`Language`|一个 <`language`> 元素。A <`language`> element.| |`LastUpdatedTime`|一个 <`lastBuildDate`> 元素。A <`lastBuildDate`> element.| |`Links`|<`a10:link`> 元素为每个集合中。An <`a10:link`> element for each in the collection.| |`Title`|一个 <`title`> 元素。A <`title`> element.| ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何创建 实例并将其序列化为 Atom 1.0 和 RSS 2.0。The following code shows how to create a instance and serialize it to both Atom 1.0 and RSS 2.0. [!code-csharp[SyndicationFeed#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationfeed/cs/program.cs#0)] [!code-vb[SyndicationFeed#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationfeed/vb/snippets.vb#0)] 下面的 XML 演示如何将 序列化为 Atom 1.0。The following XML shows how a is serialized to Atom 1.0. [!code-xml[SyndicationFeed#1](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationfeed/common/atom.xml#1)] 下面的 XML 演示如何将 实例序列化为 RSS 2.0。The following XML shows how a instance is serialized to RSS 2.0. [!code-xml[SyndicationFeed#2](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationfeed/common/rss.xml#2)]

summary.span: 使用指定的源创建 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified feed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `cloneItems` 参数为 `true`，则会克隆源 实例中的所有 实例，并将其添加到新 实例的 集合。If the `cloneItems` parameter is `true`, all instances in the source instance are cloned and added to the collection of the new instance. 如果 `cloneItems` 参数为 `false`，则新 实例的 集合会包含对现有 实例的引用。If the `cloneItems` parameter is `false`, the collection of the new instance contains references to the existing instances.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AttributeExtensions As Dictionary(Of XmlQualifiedName, String)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::Dictionary<System::Xml::XmlQualifiedName ^, System::String ^> ^ AttributeExtensions { System::Collections::Generic::Dictionary<System::Xml::XmlQualifiedName ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取属性扩展的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of attribute extensions.

value.span: 一个包含属性扩展集合的字典。

span.span: A dictionary that contains a collection of attribute extensions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性扩展是 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 规范中未指定的有效 XML 属性。An attribute extension is a valid XML attribute that is not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 序列化为 Atom 1.0 时，集合中的每个自定义属性都会写入 <`atom`> 元素。When serialized to Atom 1.0, each custom attribute in the collection is written to the <`atom`> element. 序列化为 RSS 2.0 时，每个自定义属性都会写入 <`channel`> 元素。When serialized to RSS 2.0, each custom attribute is written to the <`channel`> element. 添加属性扩展的示例，请参阅[Loosely-Typed 扩展](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/loosely-typed-extensions-sample.md)示例。For an example of adding an attribute extension, see the [Loosely-Typed Extensions](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/loosely-typed-extensions-sample.md) sample. ## Examples 下面的代码说明如何向联合源添加属性扩展。The following code shows how to add an attribute extension to a syndication feed. [!code-csharp[LooselyTypedExtensions#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/looselytypedextensions/cs/program.cs#0)] [!code-vb[LooselyTypedExtensions#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/looselytypedextensions/vb/program.vb#0)] 下面的 XML 演示如何将属性扩展序列化为 Atom 1.0。The following XML shows how an attribute extension is serialized to Atom 1.0. [!code-xml[SyndicationFeed#14](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationfeed/common/atom.xml#14)] 下面的 XML 演示如何将属性扩展序列化为 RSS 2.0。The following XML shows how an attribute extension is serialized to RSS 2.0. [!code-xml[SyndicationFeed#15](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationfeed/common/rss.xml#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Authors As Collection(Of SyndicationPerson)

summary.span: 获取源作者的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of authors of the feed.

value.span: 一个表示源作者的 对象集合。

span.span: A collection of objects that represents the authors of the feed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化为 Atom 1.0 时每个集合中写入到 <`author`> 元素。When serialized to Atom 1.0, each in the collection is written to an <`author`> element. 如果只有一个序列化为 RSS 2.0 时存在于集合中，它写入到 <`managingEditor`> 元素。When serialized to RSS 2.0, if only a single exists in the collection, it is written to a <`managingEditor`> element. 否则为每个写入到 <`a10:author`> 元素。Otherwise, each is written to an <`a10:author`> element. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何将作者添加到 的 集合。The following code shows how to add an author to the collection of a . summary.span: 获取源的元素扩展。

span.span: Gets the element extensions for the feed.

value.span: 一个包含源中元素扩展的 实例。

span.span: A instance that contains the element extensions in the feed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素扩展是 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 规范中未指定的有效 XML 元素。Element extensions are valid XML elements that are not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 可以添加任何有效的 XML 元素作为扩展名，只要该元素的命名空间与外层命名空间不同。You can add any valid XML element as an extension, provided its namespace is different from the enclosing namespace. `` 添加元素扩展的示例，请参阅[Loosely-Typed 扩展](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/loosely-typed-extensions-sample.md)示例。For an example of adding element extensions, see the [Loosely-Typed Extensions](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/loosely-typed-extensions-sample.md) sample. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何将元素扩展添加到 实例。The following code shows how to add element extensions to a instance. [!code-csharp[LooselyTypedExtensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/looselytypedextensions/cs/snippets.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LooselyTypedExtensions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/looselytypedextensions/vb/snippets.vb#1)]

param.name: serializeExtensionsAsAtom
param.span: 一个指定是否使用 Atom 1.0 命名空间序列化元素和属性扩展的值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether to serialize element and attribute extensions with an Atom 1.0 namespace.

summary.span: 获取一个新的 实例。

span.span: Gets a new instance.
An instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks RSS 2.0 规范允许使用未在其规范中指定的元素和属性，但前提是这些元素和属性必须在命名空间中。The RSS 2.0 specification allows elements and attributes that are not specified in its specification only if they are within a namespace. 如果 `serializedExtensionsAsAtom` 参数为 `true` 时，则格式化程序会自动将 `a10` 命名空间限定符添加到所有的扩展；否则，不会序列化扩展。When the `serializedExtensionsAsAtom` parameter is `true`, the formatter automatically adds the `a10` namespace qualifier to all extensions; otherwise, the extensions are not serialized.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual bool TryParseAttribute (string name, string ns, string value, string version);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool TryParseAttribute(string name, string ns, string value, string version) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Function TryParseAttribute (name As String, ns As String, value As String, version As String) As Boolean
protected public: virtual bool TryParseAttribute(System::String ^ name, System::String ^ ns, System::String ^ value, System::String ^ version);
abstract member TryParseAttribute : string * string * string * string -> bool override this.TryParseAttribute : string * string * string * string -> bool

span.span: The name of the element.
The namespace of the element.
The attribute to parse.

param.name: version
param.span: 要在分析时使用的联合版本。

span.span: The syndication version to use when parsing.

summary.span: 试图分析属性扩展。

span.span: Attempts to parse an attribute extension.

returns.span: 一个指定是否已成功分析属性扩展的值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether the attribute extension was parsed successfully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性扩展是 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 规范未定义的自定义属性。Attribute extensions are custom attributes that are not defined by the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 这些扩展会序列的属性作为 <`feed`> （为 Atom 1.0) 或 <`rss`> （适用于 RSS 1.0) 元素，具体取决于使用的联合版本。They are serialized as an attribute of the <`feed`> (for Atom 1.0) or <`rss`> (for RSS 1.0) element, which depends upon the syndication version being used. 此方法是一个扩展点，您可以利用它来处理自定义属性扩展的反序列化。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the deserialization of a custom attribute extension. 为此，必须从 中派生一个类，并重写此方法。To do this, you must derive a class from and override this method. 将为所有无法识别的属性扩展调用此方法。This method is called for all unrecognized attribute extensions.

exception.span: 读取过程中遇到无效的 XML。

span.span: Invalid XML Encountered during read.

abstract member TryParseElement : System.Xml.XmlReader * string -> bool override this.TryParseElement : System.Xml.XmlReader * string -> bool

span.span: The to read from.

param.name: version
param.span: 要在分析时使用的联合版本。

span.span: The syndication version to use while parsing.

summary.span: 试图分析元素扩展。

span.span: Attempts to parse an element extension.

returns.span: 一个指定是否已成功分析元素扩展的值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether the element extension was parsed successfully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素扩展是 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 规范中未指定的有效 XML 元素。Element extensions are valid XML elements that are not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 可以添加任何有效的 XML 元素作为扩展名，只要该元素的命名空间与外层命名空间不同。You can add any valid XML element as an extension, provided its namespace is different from the enclosing namespace. 此方法是一个扩展点，您可以利用它来处理自定义元素扩展的反序列化。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the deserialization of a custom element extension. 为此，必须从 中派生一个类，并重写此方法。To do this, you must derive a class from and override this method. 将为所有无法识别的元素扩展调用此方法。This method is called for all unrecognized element extensions.

exception.span: 读取过程中遇到无效的 XML。

span.span: Invalid XML encountered during read.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void WriteAttributeExtensions (System.Xml.XmlWriter writer, string version);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void WriteAttributeExtensions(class System.Xml.XmlWriter writer, string version) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub WriteAttributeExtensions (writer As XmlWriter, version As String)
protected public: virtual void WriteAttributeExtensions(System::Xml::XmlWriter ^ writer, System::String ^ version);
abstract member WriteAttributeExtensions : System.Xml.XmlWriter * string -> unit override this.WriteAttributeExtensions : System.Xml.XmlWriter * string -> unit

span.span: The to write to.

param.name: version
param.span: 要在写入时使用的联合版本。

span.span: The syndication version to use while writing.

summary.span: 使用指定的联合版本将属性扩展写入指定的 。

span.span: Writes the attribute extensions to the specified using the specified syndication version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性扩展是 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 规范未定义的自定义属性。Attribute extensions are custom attributes that are not defined by the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 这些扩展会序列的属性作为 <`feed`> （为 Atom 1.0) 或 <`rss`> （适用于 RSS 1.0) 元素，具体取决于使用的联合版本。They are serialized as an attribute of the <`feed`> (for Atom 1.0) or <`rss`> (for RSS 1.0) element, which depends upon the syndication version being used. 此方法是一个扩展点，您可以利用它来处理自定义属性扩展的序列化。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the serialization of custom attribute extensions. 为此，必须从 中派生一个类，并重写此方法。To do this, you must derive a class from and override this method. 将为所有无法识别的属性扩展调用此方法。This method is called for all unrecognized attribute extensions.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void WriteElementExtensions (System.Xml.XmlWriter writer, string version);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void WriteElementExtensions(class System.Xml.XmlWriter writer, string version) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub WriteElementExtensions (writer As XmlWriter, version As String)
protected public: virtual void WriteElementExtensions(System::Xml::XmlWriter ^ writer, System::String ^ version);
abstract member WriteElementExtensions : System.Xml.XmlWriter * string -> unit override this.WriteElementExtensions : System.Xml.XmlWriter * string -> unit

span.span: The to write to.

param.name: version
param.span: 要在写入时使用的联合版本。

span.span: The syndication version to use while writing.

summary.span: 使用指定的联合版本将元素扩展写入指定的 。

span.span: Writes the element extensions to the specified using the specified syndication version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素扩展是 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 规范中未指定的有效 XML 元素。Element extensions are valid XML elements that are not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 可以添加任何有效的 XML 元素作为扩展名，只要该元素的命名空间与外层命名空间不同。You can add any valid XML element as an extension, provided its namespace is different from the enclosing namespace. 此方法是一个扩展点，您可以利用它来处理自定义元素扩展的序列化。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the serialization of custom element extensions. 为此，必须从 中派生一个类，并重写此方法。To do this, you must derive a class from and override this method. 将为所有无法识别的元素扩展调用此方法。This method is called for all unrecognized element extensions.
